content.raw: I've seen this, also. It occurs when the simulation has been open for a long time with a lot of testing by sending messages to the robot. I *think* closing publishers and subscribers at the end of a run helps. But with testing you often terminate so the C++ destructors, in my case, that handle the closing aren't called.
